TIL - Configuring your jekyll site

27 Feb 2019
til
[ webdev  jekyll  ]

Some of the rule should be noted here:

Configuring jekyll for user and project github pages

Some issue iam having with:

  • Wrong setting between User Page and Project page
  • When click on post, it’s show wrong index
  • Baseurl issue, must use baseurl

Checklist for User site

  • baseurl must be empty
  • href="\{\{ site.baseurl \}\}\{\{ post.url \}\} no / between baseurl and posturl
  • Always start links with \{\{ site.baseurl \}\}
  • Always use a trailing after \{\{ site.baseurl \}\} => Fix link to resources
